IMP_HANDLING01.SQL: select P_RESULT.* from ( select rownum rankid,(count(*) OVER ()) TOTAL, x.datetime_deli, lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix, lagi.lagi_mawb_no, x.group_no, lagi.lagi_hawb, lagi.lagi_quantity_received, x.pieces_deli, lagi.lagi_weight_received, x.weight_deli, lagi.lagi_chargable_weight from ( select k.*, round(grai.grai_numeric_value) as weight_deli from ( select t.*, round(grai.grai_numeric_value) as pieces_deli from ( select grai.grai_object_isn as ID, grai.grai_object_group_isn as group_no, to_date(grai.grai_value,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as datetime_deli --to_char(to_date(grai.grai_value,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy') as datetime_received02 from han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai where grai.grai_group_type='DATE' AND grai.grai_group_code='DELIVERED' and to_date(grai.grai_value,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') between to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY') +1 )t join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on t.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and t.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='PIECES' and grai.grai_group_code='DELIVERED' )k join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on k.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and k.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='WEIGHT' and grai.grai_group_code='DELIVERED') x join lagi on x.ID = lagi.lagi_ident_no where lagi.lagi_ident_no NOT IN ( SELECT l.lagi_ident_no FROM han_w1_hl.lagi l WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM han_w1_hl.lagi t2 WHERE t2.lagi_mawb_no = l.lagi_mawb_no and t2.lagi_mawb_prefix = l.lagi_mawb_prefix AND t2.lagi_ident_no <> l.lagi_ident_no and t2.lagi_deleted = 0 ) AND l.lagi_hawb = ' ' ) AND lagi.lagi_deleted = 0 AND x.pieces_deli = 1 order by 2 ASC)P_RESULT where rankid> ({2}-1) * {3} and rankid<=((({2}-1) * {3} ) + {3})

IMP_HANDLING02.SQL: select P_RESULT.* from ( select rownum rankid,(count(*) OVER ()) TOTAL, x.datetime_deli,lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix,lagi.lagi_mawb_no,x.group_no,lagi.lagi_hawb,lagi.lagi_quantity_received,x.pieces_deli,lagi.lagi_weight_received,x.weight_deli,lagi.lagi_chargable_weight from ( select k.*, round(grai.grai_numeric_value) as weight_deli from ( select t.*, round(grai.grai_numeric_value) as pieces_deli from ( select grai.grai_object_isn as ID, grai.grai_object_group_isn as group_no, to_date(grai.grai_value,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as datetime_deli --to_char(to_date(grai.grai_value,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy') as datetime_received02 from han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai where grai.grai_group_type='DATE' AND grai.grai_group_code='DELIVERED' and to_date(grai.grai_value,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') between to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY') + 1 )t join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on t.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and t.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='PIECES' and grai.grai_group_code='DELIVERED' )k join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on k.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and k.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='WEIGHT' and grai.grai_group_code='DELIVERED') x join lagi on x.ID = lagi.lagi_ident_no where lagi.lagi_ident_no NOT IN ( SELECT l.lagi_ident_no FROM han_w1_hl.lagi l WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM han_w1_hl.lagi t2 WHERE t2.lagi_mawb_no = l.lagi_mawb_no and t2.lagi_mawb_prefix = l.lagi_mawb_prefix AND t2.lagi_ident_no <> l.lagi_ident_no and t2.lagi_deleted = 0 ) AND l.lagi_hawb = ' ' ) AND lagi.lagi_deleted = 0 AND x.pieces_deli > 1 order by 2 ASC)P_RESULT where rankid> ({2}-1) * {3} and rankid<=((({2}-1) * {3} ) + {3})

IMP_HANDLING03.SQL: select P_RESULT.* from ( select rownum rankid,(count(*) OVER ()) TOTAL, x.datetime_deli,lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix,lagi.lagi_mawb_no,x.group_no,lagi.lagi_hawb,lagi.lagi_quantity_received,x.pieces_deli,lagi.lagi_weight_received,x.weight_deli,lagi.lagi_chargable_weight from ( select k.*, round(grai.grai_numeric_value) as weight_deli from ( select t.*, round(grai.grai_numeric_value) as pieces_deli from ( select grai.grai_object_isn as ID, grai.grai_object_group_isn as group_no, to_date(grai.grai_value,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as datetime_deli --to_char(to_date(grai.grai_value,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy') as datetime_received02 from han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai where grai.grai_group_type='DATE' AND grai.grai_group_code='DELIVERED' and to_date(grai.grai_value,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') between to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY') + 1 )t join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on t.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and t.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='PIECES' and grai.grai_group_code='DELIVERED' )k join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on k.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and k.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='WEIGHT' and grai.grai_group_code='DELIVERED') x join lagi on x.ID = lagi.lagi_ident_no where lagi.lagi_ident_no NOT IN ( SELECT l.lagi_ident_no FROM han_w1_hl.lagi l WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM han_w1_hl.lagi t2 WHERE t2.lagi_mawb_no = l.lagi_mawb_no and t2.lagi_mawb_prefix = l.lagi_mawb_prefix AND t2.lagi_ident_no <> l.lagi_ident_no and t2.lagi_deleted = 0 ) AND l.lagi_hawb = ' ' ) AND lagi.lagi_deleted = 0 AND lagi.lagi_tso in ('ALSW','ALST','ALSB','ALSE','CLC','ASGL') order by 2 ASC)P_RESULT where rankid> ({2}-1) * {3} and rankid<=((({2}-1) * {3} ) + {3})

IMP_HANDLING04.SQL: select to_char(x.datetime_deli,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DateCreate, lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix, lagi.lagi_mawb_no, lagi.lagi_hawb, lagi.lagi_quantity_received, lagi.lagi_weight_received, sum(x.weight_deli) as weight, sum(x.pieces_deli) as pieces, lagi.lagi_chargable_weight as ChargeAble, case when lagi.lagi_chargable_weight > sum(x.weight_deli) then lagi.lagi_chargable_weight else sum(x.weight_deli) end as ChargeableReal from ( select k.*, round(grai.grai_numeric_value) as weight_deli from ( select t.*, round(grai.grai_numeric_value) as pieces_deli from ( select grai.grai_object_isn as ID, grai.grai_object_group_isn as group_no, to_date(grai.grai_value,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as datetime_deli --to_char(to_date(grai.grai_value,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy') as datetime_received02 from han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai where grai.grai_group_type='DATE' AND grai.grai_group_code='DELIVERED' and to_date(grai.grai_value,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') between to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY') + 1 )t join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on t.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and t.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='PIECES' and grai.grai_group_code='DELIVERED' )k join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info grai on k.ID= grai.grai_object_isn and k.group_no=grai.grai_object_group_isn and grai.grai_group_type='WEIGHT' and grai.grai_group_code='DELIVERED') x join lagi on x.ID = lagi.lagi_ident_no where lagi.lagi_ident_no NOT IN ( SELECT l.lagi_ident_no FROM han_w1_hl.lagi l WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM han_w1_hl.lagi t2 WHERE t2.lagi_mawb_no = l.lagi_mawb_no and t2.lagi_mawb_prefix = l.lagi_mawb_prefix AND t2.lagi_ident_no <> l.lagi_ident_no and t2.lagi_deleted = 0 ) AND l.lagi_hawb = ' ' ) AND lagi.lagi_deleted = 0 group by to_char(x.datetime_deli,'dd/mm/yyyy'), lagi.lagi_mawb_prefix, lagi.lagi_mawb_no, lagi.lagi_hawb, lagi.lagi_quantity_received, lagi.lagi_weight_received, lagi.lagi_chargable_weight order by 2 ASC

EXP_HANDLING01.SQL:
select P_RESULT.* from ( select rownum rankid,(count(*) OVER ()) TOTAL, a.*, round(((gra.grai_numeric_value)*1000000)/6000,3) as ChargeableWeight from (select t.*,gra.grai_numeric_value as weight from ( SELECT to_char(labs.labs_ident_no) as ID, to_char(labs.LABS_DATE_STATUS_4_SET, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as RECEIVED_DATE, labs.LABS_TIME_STATUS_4_SET as RECEIVED_TIME, to_char(labs.LABS_MAWB_PREFIX) as PREFIX, to_char(labs.LABS_MAWB_SERIAL_NO, '00000000') AS SERIAL,
-- round(((labs.labs_volume_delivered)*1000000)/6000,3) as ChargeableWeight, --labs.LABS_AGENT_NAME as AGENT_NAME , grai.grai_object_group_isn as group_objects, grai.grai_numeric_value as pieces FROM labs labs join GRAI_GROUP_ADDITIONAL_INFO grai on labs.labs_ident_no = grai.grai_object_isn and grai.grai_group_type='PIECES' and grai.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' and grai.grai_numeric_value > 1 WHERE labs.LABS_DATE_STATUS_4_SET between to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY') AND labs.labs_deleted = 0 AND labs.labs_quantity_del > 0 ORDER BY RECEIVED_DATE, RECEIVED_TIME ASC ) t join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info gra on t.ID=gra.grai_object_isn and t.group_objects = gra.grai_object_group_isn and gra.grai_group_type='WEIGHT' and gra.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' and gra.grai_numeric_value > 0 )a join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info gra on a.ID=gra.grai_object_isn and gra.grai_group_type='VOLUME' and gra.grai_group_code='DELIVERED' and a.group_objects = gra.grai_object_group_isn order by 2,3,4,5,7)P_RESULT where rankid> ({2}-1) * {3} and rankid<=((({2}-1) * {3} ) + {3})
EXP_HANDLING01.DES: Báo cáo sản lượng CNH Carton

EXP_HANDLING02.SQL: select P_RESULT.* from ( select rownum rankid,(count(*) OVER ()) TOTAL, t.*, gra.grai_numeric_value as weight from ( SELECT to_char(labs.labs_ident_no) as ID, to_char(labs.LABS_DATE_STATUS_4_SET, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as RECEIVED_DATE, labs.LABS_TIME_STATUS_4_SET as RECEIVED_TIME, to_char(labs.LABS_MAWB_PREFIX) as PREFIX, to_char(labs.LABS_MAWB_SERIAL_NO, '00000000') AS SERIAL, round(((labs.labs_volume_delivered)*1000000)/6000,3) as ChargeableWeight, --labs.LABS_AGENT_NAME as AGENT_NAME , grai.grai_object_group_isn as group_objects, grai.grai_numeric_value as pieces FROM labs labs join GRAI_GROUP_ADDITIONAL_INFO grai on labs.labs_ident_no = grai.grai_object_isn and grai.grai_group_type='PIECES' and grai.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' --and grai.grai_numeric_value > 1 WHERE labs.LABS_DATE_STATUS_4_SET between to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY') AND labs.labs_deleted = 0 AND labs.labs_quantity_del > 0 AND (labs.Labs_Agent_Name like '%ALSW%' or labs.Labs_Agent_Name like '%ALSE%' or labs.Labs_Agent_Name like '%ALST%' or labs.Labs_Agent_Name like '%ALSB%' or labs.Labs_Agent_Name like '%CLC%') ORDER BY RECEIVED_DATE, RECEIVED_TIME ASC ) t join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info gra on t.ID=gra.grai_object_isn and t.group_objects = gra.grai_object_group_isn and gra.grai_group_type='WEIGHT' and gra.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' and gra.grai_numeric_value > 0 order by 2,3,4,5,7)P_RESULT where rankid> ({2}-1) * {3} and rankid<=((({2}-1) * {3} ) + {3})

EXP_HANDLING03.SQL: select P_RESULT.* from ( select rownum rankid,(count(*) OVER ()) TOTAL, a.*, round(((gra.grai_numeric_value)*1000000)/6000,3) as ChargeableWeight from (select t.*,gra.grai_numeric_value as weight from ( SELECT to_char(labs.labs_ident_no) as ID, to_char(labs.LABS_DATE_STATUS_4_SET, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as RECEIVED_DATE, labs.LABS_TIME_STATUS_4_SET as RECEIVED_TIME, to_char(labs.LABS_MAWB_PREFIX) as PREFIX, to_char(labs.LABS_MAWB_SERIAL_NO, '00000000') AS SERIAL, -- round(((labs.labs_volume_delivered)*1000000)/6000,3) as ChargeableWeight, --labs.LABS_AGENT_NAME as AGENT_NAME , grai.grai_object_group_isn as group_objects, grai.grai_numeric_value as pieces FROM labs labs join GRAI_GROUP_ADDITIONAL_INFO grai on labs.labs_ident_no = grai.grai_object_isn and grai.grai_group_type='PIECES' and grai.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' and grai.grai_numeric_value = 1 WHERE labs.LABS_DATE_STATUS_4_SET between to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY') AND labs.labs_deleted = 0 AND labs.labs_quantity_del > 0 ORDER BY RECEIVED_DATE, RECEIVED_TIME ASC ) t join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info gra on t.ID=gra.grai_object_isn and t.group_objects = gra.grai_object_group_isn and gra.grai_group_type='WEIGHT' and gra.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' and gra.grai_numeric_value > 0 )a join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info gra on a.ID=gra.grai_object_isn and gra.grai_group_type='VOLUME' and gra.grai_group_code='DELIVERED' and a.group_objects = gra.grai_object_group_isn order by 2,3,4,5,7)P_RESULT where rankid> ({2}-1) * {3} and rankid<=((({2}-1) * {3} ) + {3})

EXP_HANDLING04.SQL: select t.ID,t.RECEIVED_DATE,t.PREFIX,t.SERIAL, round(((t.volumed)*1000000)/6000,3) as ChargeableWeight, sum(gra.grai_numeric_value) as weight, sum(t.pieces) as pieces, case when round(((t.volumed)*1000000)/6000,3) > sum(gra.grai_numeric_value) then round(((t.volumed)*1000000)/6000,3) else sum(gra.grai_numeric_value) end as ChargeableReal from ( SELECT to_char(labs.labs_ident_no) as ID, to_char(labs.LABS_DATE_STATUS_4_SET, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as RECEIVED_DATE, to_char(labs.LABS_MAWB_PREFIX) as PREFIX, to_char(labs.LABS_MAWB_SERIAL_NO, '00000000') AS SERIAL, grai.grai_object_group_isn as group_objects, grai.grai_numeric_value as pieces, labs.labs_volume_delivered as volumed FROM labs labs join GRAI_GROUP_ADDITIONAL_INFO grai on labs.labs_ident_no = grai.grai_object_isn and grai.grai_group_type='PIECES' and grai.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' and grai.grai_numeric_value = 1 WHERE labs.LABS_DATE_STATUS_4_SET between to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY') AND labs.labs_deleted = 0 AND labs.labs_quantity_del > 0 ORDER BY RECEIVED_DATE ASC ) t join han_w1_hl.grai_group_additional_info gra on t.ID=gra.grai_object_isn and t.group_objects = gra.grai_object_group_isn and gra.grai_group_type='WEIGHT' and gra.grai_group_code='RECEIVED' and gra.grai_numeric_value > 0 group by t.ID,t.RECEIVED_DATE,t.PREFIX,t.SERIAL,t.volumed order by 2,3,4,5,7

EXP_HANDLING05.SQL:
SELECT t.CARGO_TYPE,sum(t.DEPARTED_PIECES) as Total_PIECES,sum(t.DEPARTED_WEIGHT) as TOTAL_WEIGHT FROM (SELECT to_char(to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flup.flup_actual_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DEPARTURE_DATE, case when flup.FLUP_FLIGHT_NO_LVG in ('CI','CX','EK','ET','JL','KE','5X','VN','VZ','KA','TK','LJ','LD') then flup.FLUP_FLIGHT_NO_LVG else 'Other' end as FLIGHT_NO , labs.labs_mawb_prefix||labs.labs_mawb_serial_no as MAWB, sum(awbu.awbu_pieces) as DEPARTED_PIECES, sum( awbu.AWBU_WEIGHT) as DEPARTED_WEIGHT, case when sum( awbu.AWBU_WEIGHT) / sum(awbu.awbu_pieces) > {3} then 'SKID' else 'Carton' end as Cargo_Type
FROM FLUP flup JOIN CONT cont ON cont.CONT_FLIGHT_NO_ = flup.flup_flight_no and to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + cont.CONT_DATE = to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flup.flup_scheduled_date JOIN AWBU_AWBPERULD_LIST awbu on awbu.awbu_uld_isn = cont.cont_uld_isn JOIN LABS labs on awbu.awbu_mawb_ident_no = labs.LABS_IDENT_NO WHERE 1= 1 and to_date('02-01-0001' ,'DD-MM-YYYY') + flup.FLUP_ACTUAL_DATE between to_date('{0}', 'dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('{1}', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND labs.labs_deleted = 0 and (flup.flup_flight_no_lvg || flup.flup_flight_no = '{2}' or '{2}' = 'ALL' ) group by flup.flup_actual_date, flup.FLUP_FLIGHT_NO_LVG,flup.flup_flight_no , labs.labs_mawb_prefix,labs.labs_mawb_serial_no)t group by t.Cargo_Type
